d6367f4c-4fee-4bd6-bbf2-d09fe636d5d9.name: Ops. Percentage of VM with CPU Ready
d6367f4c-4fee-4bd6-bbf2-d09fe636d5d9.formula: count( ${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=VirtualMachine, metric=cpu|readyPct, depth=2, where="cpu|readyPct>0.3"}) / ${this, metric=summary|number_running_vms}*100

0ccf0ff4-a279-42f4-8abe-8dcbafee5bae.name: Ops. Percentage of VM with CPU CoStop
0ccf0ff4-a279-42f4-8abe-8dcbafee5bae.formula: count(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=VirtualMachine, metric=cpu|costopPct, depth=2, where="cpu|costopPct>0.1"}) / ${this, metric=summary|number_running_vms}*100

bd812200-4794-4cc3-9e1f-2daead31d7b5.name: Ops. Percentage of VM with RAM Contention
bd812200-4794-4cc3-9e1f-2daead31d7b5.formula: count( ${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=VirtualMachine, metric=mem|host_contentionPct, depth=5, where="mem|host_contentionPct>0"}) / ${this, metric=summary|number_running_vms}*100
